0111010011000111 1000010101000010 1 -> sum: 1111101000001010, cout: 0
1011011110110001 1001110110100001 1 -> sum: 0101010101010011, cout: 1
0110111110000101 0100001001111000 0 -> sum: 1011000111111101, cout: 0
1001000011111011 1010001100000010 1 -> sum: 0011001111111110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
